articles.title: Don't Buy Apple's Accessories

articles.author: James Vincent
articles.title: Apple promises third-party payment options in iOS for South Korean users
articles.description: Apple will allow third-party payment options for the first time in iOS apps in South Korea. Google announced similar concessions following legislation designed to weaken Apple and Google’s grip on their respective app stores.
articles.content:
Apple gives up in South Korea, but the terms of surrender are still unclear
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Apple says it will introduce third-party payment options for the first time ever … [+2356 chars]

articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Apple now has 1.8 billion active devices
articles.description: Apple now has 1.8 billion active devices worldwide. The iPhone maker posted record revenue and profits, boosted by strong Mac and iPhone holiday sales.
articles.content:
Apples device numbers jump as it posts record earnings
